text: chea karpit nasa puok anak del ban niyeay tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh kuchea mcheasa tibei knongchamnaom mcheasa teang bei noh pitchea ban klaycha puok del kmean chomnue . haey kmean mcheasa na phe sa ng del trauv ke korp sakkar da pitabrakd laey ku meante mcheasa( a l laoh) temuoyokt . haey brasenbae puokke minoprom b pea chh b nouv ei v del puok ke niyeay te noh tearounakamm da sen chhucheab pitchea nung thleak towleu p yk del brachheang knongchamnaom puokke cheaminkhan
